Title: Requires reporting on merit determinations relating to unfair labor practices and a certificate of compliance to be eligible for state economic incentives
Summary: Requires reporting on merit determinations relating to unfair labor practices to the department of labor and a certificate of compliance to be eligible for state economic incentives.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to requiring reporting on merit determinations relating to unfair labor practices and a certificate of compliance to be eligible for state economic incentives
